errorWhileSaving.message: There was an unknown error while saving.

extensionDescription.message: Adds an option to the context menu to reverse search an image on various services

msgAtLeastOneSearchProvider.message: Please choose at least one search provider!

msgDuplicatedProviderName.message: Some search provider name is duplicated!

msgIconUploadNotImage.message: Please upload available image format! (png, jpg, ico)

msgIconUploadNotSupported.message: Using icons in context menus is not supported by this browser.

providerNamePlaceholderError.message: The name of provider $index$ is invalid. Please use 2-15 letters.

providerURLPlaceholder.message: http(s):// at the beginning and %s for the image url...

providerURLPlaceholderError.message: The url of provider $index$ is invalid. Use http(s):// at the beginning and %s as a placeholder for the image url.

searchAllByDefault_info.message: When this option is enabled, only one context menu entry is shown and clicking it will open all selected search providers. If this is disabled, a submenu will be created.
